com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graph

Class GraphEdgeList<V,E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graph.GraphEdgeList<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Type of element stored at a vertex
    E - Type of element stored at an edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<V,E>

    public class GraphEdgeList<V,E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<V,E>
    ADT Graph implementation that stores a collection of edges (and vertices) and where each edge contains the references for the vertices it connects.
    Does not allow duplicates of stored elements through equals criteria.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphEdgeList()
      Creates a empty graph.

                                              throws InvalidVertexException

        Description copied from interface: Graph
